name: Inselect
body:
### Welcome to Inselect.
Inselect is a tool to support the mass digitisation of natural history specimens. It currently supports automated recognition, cropping and annotation of scanned drawers of pinned insects and trays of microscope slides. 

### Authors and Contributors
* Stefan van der Walt (@stefanv): Application development and segmentation algorithm
* Pieter Holtzhausen (@holtzhau): Application development and segmentation algorithm
* Alice Heaton (@aliceh75): Application development

This work was part-funded by the SYNTHESYS Project http://www.synthesys.info/ which is financed by European Community Research Infrastructure Action under the FP7 "Integrating Activities" Programme.
